DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : study effect insect protein performance hypertrophy 8 week resistance training . Hypothesis : Insect protein supplementation enhances effect resistance training muscle mass muscle strength . Primary outcome : Muscle hypertrophy muscle strength Design : Two group healthy young men ( age : 18-30 year ) resistance training experience , structural resistance training perform last 12 month . Randomized control intervention study +/- insect protein ( placebo group ingest isocaloric carbohydrate ) . Both group perform 8 week progressive resistance training ( 4/week ) aim induce muscle hypertrophy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Insect Protein Performance Hypertrophy
DOC.criteria: Healthy young men ( age : 1830 year ) experience resistance training 2 hour physical exercise per week No structural resistance training last 12 month No injuries No smoke No ingest protein create supplementation No use medicine may influence adaptation strength training
